name: The Alchemist
title: A Journey of Self-Discovery
short_description: A novel about a shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend.

name: Atomic Habits

short_description: A book on building good habits and breaking bad ones for long-term success.

name: Clean Code
title: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
short_description: Guidelines and best practices for writing maintainable and readable code.

title: Big Brother is Watching You
short_description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that controls every aspect of life.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
title: What the Rich Teach Their Kids About Money
short_description: A personal finance book that contrasts the mindset of the rich and poor.

name: The Pragmatic Programmer
title: Your Journey to Mastery
short_description: A book on software development best practices and career growth.

name: The 5 AM Club
title: Own Your Morning, Elevate Your Life
short_description: A book about the power of waking up early for success.

name: Deep Work

short_description: A book about improving focus and productivity in the digital age.

name: The Psychology of Money

short_description: A book that explores how people think about money and wealth.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

short_description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing the wizarding world.
